about_the_game:
Meet Vincent!

You play as Vincent, a hotdog seller with big dreams, a loyal dog, and a wild soul. Starting with a basic hotdog cart, he’s ready to rise to the top, dealing with quirky customers, wild fights, and more! Will he become the hotdog king?

Pick Your Sauce, Create Yummy Hotdogs!

Choose from a variety of delicious sauces and toppings, then serve up your tasty creations to hungry customers. The better your hotdogs, the more money you’ll make.

Baguette as a weapon??

Unleash your creativity in the fight! From baguettes to toilet brushes, mops, and more—get creative and show those unhappy customers who's boss in the most absurd fights ever!

A simulator game, literally!

Cleaning up has never been so... unique! Use your pee to clean up messes in the toilet. It’s a different way to tackle the dirty work and add a bit of silliness to your day! Who says cleaning can’t be entertaining?

Care for Your Loyal Friend!

Feed, play with, and take your furry friend on walks to keep him happy and healthy! Show your dog the love it deserves and build an unbreakable bond while enjoying fun adventures together.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes a choice based alcohol or tobacco consumption.

detailed_description:
DON'T FORGET TO WHISTLIST!


About the Game

Meet Vincent!

You play as Vincent, a hotdog seller with big dreams, a loyal dog, and a wild soul. Starting with a basic hotdog cart, he’s ready to rise to the top, dealing with quirky customers, wild fights, and more! Will he become the hotdog king?

Pick Your Sauce, Create Yummy Hotdogs!

Choose from a variety of delicious sauces and toppings, then serve up your tasty creations to hungry customers. The better your hotdogs, the more money you’ll make.

Baguette as a weapon??

Unleash your creativity in the fight! From baguettes to toilet brushes, mops, and more—get creative and show those unhappy customers who's boss in the most absurd fights ever!

A simulator game, literally!

Cleaning up has never been so... unique! Use your pee to clean up messes in the toilet. It’s a different way to tackle the dirty work and add a bit of silliness to your day! Who says cleaning can’t be entertaining?

Care for Your Loyal Friend!

Feed, play with, and take your furry friend on walks to keep him happy and healthy! Show your dog the love it deserves and build an unbreakable bond while enjoying fun adventures together.
name: Hotdog Simulator: Hot Dog in Miami

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1st gen / Intel Core i5 7th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3rd gen / Intel Core i5 10th gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700XT 8GB / NVIDIA RTX 2070 8GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space GB available space

short_description: Hotdog Simulator is the most absurd simulation game ever! Start with a cart, upgrade to a van, or even buy a restaurant. Along the way, you'll face arguments, wild fights, and even baguette battles. It’s all about making hotdogs—how absurd could it be? Play and find out!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Thai, Ukrainian
